column5: Yes, I've tried the site's search function, and a Google search limited to ofncommunity.com.  Might've had better luck if I could remember who posted it, or the names of any of the little shops that were mentioned, but I'm drawing a blank.

Yes!  Thanks!  I likely screwed up and used the OFC search for tackle instead of bait.  I know I used both terms on Google, and using the word bait didn't work.  Surprising, since Google seems to find everything else here.
